headline: Why The Narrative Around Forge Global Holdings FRGE Is Shifting To The Schwab US$45 Cash Offer
summary: Why the Price Target Now Anchors to the US$45 Cash Offer Recent research has effectively reframed Forge Global as a deal driven story, with the fair value now held steady at US$45.00 per share to match the agreed all cash offer from Charles Schwab. This keeps the core valuation assumption tied to a specific transaction price rather than a wide range of potential outcomes based on standalone growth.
